title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Breaking news on Mueller hoax we've known for 3 years. Spread of coronavirus throughout America almost all traced back to New York. Cuomo "shocked" 66% of new cases stayed at home. Why did we lock down? Cuomo taxing Samaritan's Purse for setting up NYC hospital. Trump's not the problem, he's the solution. Dems aren't angry at Schiff. Lockdown was unnecessary, economy will not rebound fast because people are scared. The safest place to be is outside. Cuomo poses a great threat to this country. Democrats get credit for caring about people but they don't. Trump cares about people. Trump is devastated by this crisis. If Democrats cared about people they wouldn't want to leave the country shut down. Three states: NY, NJ, MA account for 52% of the coronavirus deaths in America.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rush is not dumping on New York, but the facts are the facts: 51% of coronavirus deaths come from NY, NJ and MA. Trump is right to shelve the CDC reopening guidelines. Experts have been wrong all through this. Where are all the deaths from Spring Break on the beach in Florida? What would the founding fathers think of America's coronavirus response? Rush's favorite COVID-19 conspiracy theories. Enemies of Trump using the pandemic against him.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

EIB models project 43 million listeners. Homeless taking over empty California hotels, LA city council trying to shame luxury hotels to take in homeless. Citizens suing California for the right to go to work. States raise up armies of "contact tracers" to forcibly quarantine coronavirus patients. Judge in Luther case is an activist Democrat. The Turtle on the Mueller, Schiff news. Rosenstein's Mueller scope memo. DOJ drops case against Flynn, CNN outraged.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
